text: Zamora () is a city in Castile and León, Spain, the capital of the province of Zamora. It lies on a rocky hill in the northwest, near the frontier with Portugal and crossed by the Duero river. ==References== ==Other websites== *Tourism in Zamora *Zamora travel guide *Main festival of Zamora SEMANA SANTA ZAMORA * Web page dedicated to the Semana Santa, All content is Creative Commons *Entry on planetware.com Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:Province of Zamora Category:Municipalities in Castile and León
title: Zamora, Spain
